WSUS32 KKCI 082355 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 2C 
VALID UNTIL 0155Z 
NE CO WY 
FROM 30ESE SNY-30S CYS 
LINE TS 40 NM WIDE MOV FROM 24020KT. TOPS TO FL350. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 090155-090555 
AREA 1...FROM 40NNW MAF-40E FST-50SW MRF-60SSE ELP-50NW INK-40NNW 
MAF 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40SW ONL-50S OBH-30E GLD-DEN-30N CYS-40SW ONL 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.AREA
